How to Play: Through diplomacy and war become the strongest house in Westeros.

Draw Westeros Cards: Reveal top card for all three decks.

Advance Wildlings Track: Ignore any Icons moving it over 12.
If at 12, immediatley resolve Wildling Attack.

Wildling Attack: Night's Watch wins if Power Tolens > Wilding Strength.

Reset Wildling Track: Return to 0 on Night's watch win.

Wildling Attack: Reveal top Wildling card. Contains rewards or penalties.
Night's Watch Victory reward goes to highest Power Bidder.

Resolve Westeros Cards: May Supply, Muster, Clash of Kings
In turn order. (or not for speed)
Re-Defines how much army you can afford.
Move player barrel to match controlled supply icons.

Supply: Show's you can have a 4 unit army
As many 1 units as you want.
If you're now over a limit
Remove units from board until you're valid.

Resolve Westeros Cards: In turn order. (or not for speed)

Muster: Ship $1, place in adjacent Port or Sea space.

Resolve Westeros Cards: Silently bid for order per track.
Ties decided by owner of Iron Throne Token.

Clash of Kings: Top to Bottom, earning Reward Token after each.
Place unused Power Tokens in front of screen.
Reward Sword = +1 to one battle per round.
Defines how many *Special Order Tokens that are usable to you.
Rewards Raven = Replace one Order Token
OR Look at top Wildling Deck. Return to top or bottom.

Raid: Remove adjacent Raid, Support, Consolidate Power

March: Per unit, move to adjacent territory.

Defense: Adds it's defense bonus in territory.
As many times as it's attacked.

Support: Per unit, add's unit strength to adjacent territory.

Raven: Defines how many *Special Order Tokens that are usable to you.
Rewards Raven = Replace one Order Token
OR Look at top Wildling Deck. Return to top or bottom.

Raid: Remove adjacent Raid, Support, Consolidate Power, (Defense with *Special).
Remove Consolidate Power adds one Power Token, loser discards one Power Token.
Land cannot Raid sea, Sea can Raid either.
May choose to not resolve token.

March: Per unit, move to adjacent territory.
Lose control if abandoning territory OR leave a Power Token.

Sword Token: Fiefdom Track Order breaks tied battles.
Reward Sword = +1 to one battle per round.

Defense: Adds it's defense bonus in territory.
As many times as it's attacked.

Support: Add all units strength to adjacent territory.

Phases: Ties broken up by the Fiefdom Track order.

Call for support: If vacating a terrirtory, optionally leave a Power Token to retain control.
Request help from adjacent Support Tokens.
Agreed ally gives full territory strength to one side.
Support Tokens can be reused for all adjacent battles.

Seige Engine: +4 if attacking or supporting an attack against a Castle or Stronghold.

Choose and reveal one House Card.

Draw Tides of Battle cards: Shuffle all Tides of Battle cards.

May Use Sword token: Use the Sword token to discard and draw again.

Reveal Tides of Battle cards: Most points, tieds broken by Fiefdom Track.

Modify Casualities: Add Sword or Fortification icons to your played House Card.

Resolve Sword or Fortification Icons: Must destroy 1 unit per = attacker sword - forticication icons.

Resolve Skill Icons: If either player's Tides of Battle card contained 1+ Skulls.
In addition to the loss from Sword Icons.

Retreats or Routing: If Attacker lost, must retreat to attacking territory.
If Defender lost, must reteat to...

Defender Retreats: Uncontrolled = no units or Power Tokens.
Retreating Units can't break Supply Limits.
May use ships to transport a retreat.
Place retreated units on side to indicate 'Routed'

Routed: No more adding to battle strength.
Doesn't join battle, so can't be destroyed as sword/skull icon penalty.
A routed unit, later forced to retreat is destroyed.

Resolve Battle: Attacker Wins, remove Attacked Order Token.
Discard enemy Power Token marking control.
Non-controlled territory immediately becomes original owner's territory again.
Defender Wins, doesn't affect Attackers Tokens.
Continue with next Iron Throne Track Player Order, March Order

EOR: Flip Sword and Raven Token to usable side.
Always keep Victory Track instantly current.

Winning: Instantly when Player completes Victory Track.
OR Highest Victory Track after 10 Rounds
Ties broken my count of Strongholds.
Else Ties broken by highest Supply Limit
Else Ties broken by most Power tokens.
Finally Ties broken by Iron Throne Track.

Ship Transports: for Marching Orders, considers 2 Territorys connected by 1+ sea areas, each with 1+ of own ships.
May use a ship to transport as much as necessary.
Even Multiple times in the same March Order Token.

Ports: Only used by controlling land area player.
Can Muster into a Port even if enemy in sea area.
Ports can't be attacked, so no Defense Tokens.
Ships can March Order into their owned Ports.
Ships can Support/March/Raid adjacent sea areas only.
Ports can be Raided by adjacent sea area.
Adjacent Sea area must be empty/controlled to use Consolidate Power Order Token.
If Ports land area is conquered, you may replace 0+ enemy Port Ships with their own.
If resolving an Initial Westeros Phase: Westeros Card, also collect Power Icons per Port where Port contains ship AND Adjacent sea area is empty/controlled.

Other Terrain: River consider's neighbooring territorys not adjacent.
Islands = Dragonstone/ Pyke/ The Arbor (contain white border)
Islands, just normal terriroys. considers only surrounding sea area as adjacent

Controlled Areas: When you have 1+ unit(s) or Power Token.

Garrisons: If attacked without any normal unit(s), still occurs.

Finally Alliances: At any time make promises/seek alliance.
